Subject: Your VPS has reach 80% of his network quota

Hello,

Your Xen Virtual Server (VPS) %%%VPS_NUMBER%%%:%%%VPS_NODE%%%
has reached 80% of its monthly network transfer quota. Please note that
when monthly network transfer quota, your VPS may be shutdown at any
time. Please file a support ticket to reach the billing department if
you want to pay for more bandwidth.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
